member.name: SOCKADDR_IN
member.summary: The SOCKADDR_IN structure specifies a transport address and port for theAF_INET address family.

member.name: SOCKADDR_IN.sin_family
member.summary: The address family for the transport address. This member should always be set to AF_INET.

member.name: SOCKADDR_IN.sin_addr
member.summary: AnIN_ADDR structure that contains an IPv4 transport address.

member.name: SOCKADDR_IN.sin_zero
member.summary: Reserved for system use. A WSK application should set the contents of this array to zero.
